content: one simple change to the ordinary double_crochet creates an entirely unexpected look left- and right-slanting stitches create a fabric with just the right combination of solid and drape an oh-so-simple chain stitch edging completes the piece use 100% cotton yarn for best results learn the herringbone double_crochet with the video tutorial linked here the pattern includes both written text and charted instructions this pattern uses american crochet terminology
